Articles.Content: I want to add pics to my comments but idk how

First, this belongs in Kerbal Network.

That aside, certain image hosting sites automatically embed; just paste the "direct link" here. If that doesn't work, use the Insert Other Media button (bottom left), then Image from Link. Paste the direct link there. How do I know if it's a direct link, you ask? Well, if it has a file extension, it's probably a direct link. Otherwise, it's definitely not.

An Imgur account simplifies some things, but is not required to host your pics there.

If you took them with steam, you can also go to your gamelibary in steam, pictures, and get the link of the picture you've taken. When you're writing a comment, click 'Insert other media' on the bottom right, 'Insert image from URL', paste the link.... profit!
